title: Star Guardian quiz, which Star are you?

embed.description: Which of the newest Star Guardians do you align with? Take the quiz to discover your star.

body:
It was a fun little, quiz , among all of them i could relate to Soraka and guess what i got ? 




http://i.imgur.com/owZi2Sb.jpg

replies.body:
I got Ezreal.

I suppose he and I do share an interest in maps?
Are you me?

> [{quoted}](name=Fasmodey,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=T5KjWryE,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2017-09-07T23:55:00.209+0000)
>
> Are you me?

I don't think so.  Because if I'm you, who's me?!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=T5KjWryE,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2017-09-08T00:15:13.806+0000)
>
> I don't think so.  Because if I'm you, who's me?!

If you're him and he's you I guess I would be me. At least that's what the me who believes in you who believes in him believes.

Y'all mangos.

*slowly walks away*
{{champion:420}} approves

You're...

a paradox.

Or should I say "I am"?
didn't he say maps are overrated? :P Unless... you mean....

Post your descriptions?

I got Syndra. Am I a good guy, or a bad guy?

There is no good and evil. There is only power, and those too weak to seek it.

I got Syndra too.
I got Syndra too, I think she's a good person, she just isn't one to shy away from picking fights.
Done , my description is now attached :)

You make your own path, if description really explains you. It can be good or bad, that's all up to you.

Syndra is in the darker side of this spectrum, but she is not necessarily evil. (prime lore but same can be said for Star Guardian Syndra too)

I got Syndra.

Probably kind of accurate. I'm always the one with the weird opinions who points out the things others say make sense.
I gots Miss Fortune
Same.
I got miss fortune, 4 times, in a row, I'm nothing like what it describes. :/
some of those questions gave me identity crisis dont worry about it.
I got Syndra... Guess im powerhungry... I could go for some food rn tho....
Got {{champion:103}} <3
thats awesome :)

I got Ahri ♥

Gotta admit, I do like my Ice cream sundaes.
Glad you are happy with the result :D
i got my girl {{champion:103}}

I got Ezreal even though I tried to be as Soraka as possible.  Gross.  




Soraka's pet name is Shisa btw xD  Red bean ice cream ftw!!!!!
{{champion:134}} for this year and {{champion:222}} for last year.
I got Soraka.

http://i.imgur.com/otCyjjHg.png

Get Glad, I get Glad! Darnnit Rito lemme have my fun.

I ended up getting Ezreal. I don't even really play him but this skin for him is making me question if I should start.

Can you be any starguardian, or just one of the new 5?
Because I got Miss Fortune and was highly dissappointed that I didn't get Jinx like last time. =(
its only about the new ones, not old team :D

Ah, ok, then I am fine with MF. At least she has guns, too. :D
Thanks for the information.

I've taken the new test like six times because every time I answer a thread I do it again, and I always get MF. Last year, I got Jinx.

So I guess I'm an asshole. :P
hehe but Jinx or MF are not assholes not to me atleast.

{{champion:6}} 

"You cannot know friendship... _until you are **broken!**"_

{{champion:16}} 

{{champion:78}} back in the old days.
I got Ahri and I'm more than a little surprised.
I got Ezreal.

I got Ahri.

My answers were actually rather depressing.

wait the description of Ahri result doesn't really fit into "depressing" so HOW? :D

i mean for me it was all "i let people walk all over me" kind of attitude when i was answering them and i got Soraka. Ahri is far different from Soraka so im confused.
Not sure.  I think it's something to do with worldview.
I got Soraka.  I'm very happy.

I’m #StarGuardian Syndra! Discover which star aligns with you:

http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/star-guardian-2017/quiz/results/syndra

I also got Soraka. 

I got Janna in the last groups quiz too, so it seems like it's probably not a coincidence that I main Janna (and more broadly the support role, including soraka).

I got Ahri....

WTF!?
the description doesn't match? i mean there is inconsistency in the final description for her.
I got Soraka. I am happy with this outcome.
